uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet

Class CrossCookieComposite

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.data.Composite<WtmpManager.Wtmp,CrossCookieComposite>
      • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet.CrossCookieComposite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Contexed, TableStructureContributer<WtmpManager.Wtmp>, LogoutListener

    public class CrossCookieComposite
extends Composite<WtmpManager.Wtmp,CrossCookieComposite>
implements LogoutListener
    A composite added to a WtmpManager that records cookie values for cross application SSO The cookie data should be of the format id-random-data where id is the id of the Wtmp record. Only the random-data part is actually stored in the data field.
    Author:
    spb
